title: ğŸŒŠ 8th Annual Irish Sea Level Meeting
text:
Maynooth University | Hybrid Format
This yearâ€™s Irish Sea Level Meeting brings together researchers to discuss recent advances in sea-level science and coastal impacts. Day 1 features a series of invited talks and presentations, while Day 2 provides hands-on, workshop-style sessions aimed at building tools and skills for sea-level research.

Online:

ğŸ“‹ Registration
To help us plan for catering â€” and to receive updates â€”

Registration is free.
Lunch and coffee breaks will be provided for registered in-person participants.
